title: Did Law & Order’s Maroun Exact Deadly Revenge for Her Sister’s Murder? Read Finale Recap and Weigh In!
description: By the end of Law & Order‘s Season 24 finale, the man that Assistant District Attorney Samantha Maroun thinks killed her sister years ago is dead. Maroun couldn’t have had anything to do with the man’s murder… could she? Executive ADA Nolan Price certainly thinks so, which causes him to pound on her door on […]
author: Kimberly Roots

title: Georgie & Mandy’s Emily Osment, EP Talk Threat to First Marriage (Chris Gorham!) and Season 2 Plans
description: Is divorce already in sight for Georgie & Mandy’s First Marriage? Thursday’s Season 1 finale lobbed a pair of curveballs at the titular couple, including the introduction of Mandy’s ex-boyfriend, former San Antonio station manager Scott (played by Christopher Gorham). He just so happens to be her boss again, and maybe… possibly… most definitely still […]
author: Ryan Schwartz

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook
